meanings.sent1: The color of the flower was intrinsically beautiful.
meanings.sent2: Her kindness was intrinsically part of her personality.
meanings.sent3: The intrinsically cozy blanket made everyone want to snuggle up.
meanings.sent4: His intrinsically honest nature shone through in every conversation.
meanings.sent5: The intrinsically sweet taste of the ripe fruit lingered on her tongue.

meanings.definition: In an essential or natural manner.
meanings.sent1: She believed in being intrinsically honest with herself.
meanings.sent2: The music resonated intrinsically with the audience.
meanings.sent3: The cat intrinsically knew when it was time for dinner.
meanings.sent4: His words cut through the silence intrinsically.
meanings.sent5: The laughter bubbled up intrinsically from deep within her.

meanings.definition: In a way that is inherent or innate.
meanings.sent1: The artist's talent shone intrinsically in every brushstroke.
meanings.sent2: She understood the concept intrinsically without any explanation.
meanings.sent3: The puppy intrinsically knew how to fetch the ball.
meanings.sent4: His love for nature was intrinsically connected to his childhood memories.
meanings.sent5: The feeling of peace washed over her intrinsically as she sat by the lake.
